original: spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa la sogs pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa yin pa dang /
analyzed: spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa la sogs pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa yin pa dang /
translated: The phrase the object of observation of the path of the yoga of individual knowledge of the aspects is to be applied to the entity of the path of serenity and insight that is included within the yoga of individual knowledge of the aspects.🔽 The phrase the object of observation of the path of the

original: de dag ni lhag mthong gi phyogs dang / dngos po thams cad dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni lhag mthong gi phyogs dang / dngos po thams cad dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The object of both is the limit of existence, which is the object of the knowledge of all things as they are and as they seem to be, and the object of the knowledge of the reality of cause and effect.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan ni lhag mthong gi phyogs kyi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan ni lhag mthong gi phyogs kyi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The conceptual image is the object of insight.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs kyi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs kyi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The nonconceptual image is the object of serenity.

original: dngos po'i mtha' ni ji snyed yod pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po'i mtha' ni ji snyed yod pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin /
translated: The limit of existence is the object of the knowledge of all things as they are and as they seem to be, and the object of the knowledge of the reality of cause and effect.

original: dgos pa yongs su grub pa ni yid la byed pa yongs su grub pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gnas ngan len spangs pa dang / gnas gyur pa dang / dngos gzhi thob pa dang / shes bya la shes pa dang / mthong ba 'jug pa nyid kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin pas /
analyzed: dgos pa yongs su grub pa ni yid la byed pa yongs su grub pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gnas ngan len spangs pa dang / gnas gyur pa dang / dngos gzhi thob pa dang / shes bya la shes pa dang / mthong ba 'jug pa nyid kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin pas /
translated: The fully present result is the object of observation that has the nature of cause and effect by means of the cause of the fully present mental contemplation, the abandonment of the negative tendencies, the transformation of the basis, the attainment of the actual basis, the knowledge of the object of knowledge, and the engagement of the vision.

original: de dag ni khyab pa'i dmigs pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de dag ni khyab pa'i dmigs pa zhes bya ste /
translated: These are called the pervasive objects of observation.

original: de nyid mngon du bya ba mkhyen nas /
analyzed: de nyid mngon du bya ba mkhyen nas /
translated: Having understood that reality,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste /
translated: the Bhagavan taught these four things that are the objects of observation of serenity and insight:🔽the object of observation that is the image with conception, the object of observation that is the image without conception, the object of observation that is the limit of entities, and the object of observation that is the fully present result.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / dngos po'i mtha' dang / dgos pa yongs su grub pa'o zhes gang dag bstan pa de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas dmigs pa sbyor ba'i rgyu gang yin pa @140a * //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / dngos po'i mtha' dang / dgos pa yongs su grub pa'o zhes gang dag bstan pa de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas dmigs pa sbyor ba'i rgyu gang yin pa @140a * //
translated: The object of observation that is the image with conception is the object of observation of the mental contemplation of thorough isolation.

original: dang ; dmigs pa gang ni lam gang gi dmigs pa yin par sbyar ro //
analyzed: dang ; dmigs pa gang ni lam gang gi dmigs pa yin par sbyar ro //
translated: and the object of which path is the object of which path.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi rnam pas rab tu phye ba'i shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun ba sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi rnam pas rab tu phye ba'i shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun ba sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: Among them, the so-called conceptual image is the self-awareness of the mental image of the object of knowledge that is similar to the object, distinguished by the aspects of insight.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhis bsdus pa sgo gsum dang ldan pa bzhi rab tu dbye ba drug la dmigs🔽pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhis bsdus pa sgo gsum dang ldan pa bzhi rab tu dbye ba drug la dmigs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Among them, the so-called conceptual is distinguished by the attention of the path of preparation, the aspect of insight included in the four practices of wisdom, endowed with the three doors, and has the six distinctions as its object.

original: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba /
translated: The so-called image is distinguished by that aspect of conceptual insight,

original: shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa /
translated: similar to the object of knowledge,

original: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: the self-awareness of the mental image.

original: de la sbyor ba'i lam gyis yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi nam pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa la brten nas shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar byas pa'i phyir
analyzed: de la sbyor ba'i lam gyis yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi nam pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa la brten nas shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar byas pa'i phyir
translated: The aspect of insight that is distinguished by the attention of the path of preparation is called the “aspect of the path of insight.”

original: / mos pa yid la byed pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: / mos pa yid la byed pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the aspect of insight that is the attention of the stage of meditative equipoise, because it causes the aspects of the objects of knowledge to appear to one’s mind.

original: shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhi gang zhe na rnam par 'byed pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / yongs su dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhi gang zhe na rnam par 'byed pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / yongs su dpyod pa'o //
translated: What are the four kinds of activities of wisdom? They are differentiation, complete differentiation, thorough investigation, and thorough analysis.

original: de la rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is differentiation?

original: spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa dang / mkhas pa'i dmigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa dag la ji snyed yod pa nyid kyis rnam par 'byed par byed ba'i shes rab gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa dang / mkhas pa'i dmigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa dag la ji snyed yod pa nyid kyis rnam par 'byed par byed ba'i shes rab gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the wisdom that differentiates the object of observation that purifies behavior, the object of observation of expertise, and the object of observation that purifies the afflictions, through knowing them as they are and knowing them in their extent.

original: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is thorough analysis?

original: dmigs pa de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid kyis rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid kyis rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the wisdom which thoroughly analyzes those objects as they are.

original: yongs su rtog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su rtog pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is thorough examination?

original: shes rab de nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas mtshan mar 'dzin par byed pa'i tshe na ni yongs su rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: shes rab de nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas mtshan mar 'dzin par byed pa'i tshe na ni yongs su rtog pa yin no //
translated: It is the thorough examination of those objects by the mental activity associated with that wisdom, by means of the discernment of characteristics.

original: yongs su dpyod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su dpyod pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is thorough investigation?

original: shes rab de gnyis dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa de nyid kyis yang dag par rtog par byed pa'i tshe na ni yongs su dpyod pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab de gnyis dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa de nyid kyis yang dag par rtog par byed pa'i tshe na ni yongs su dpyod pa yin /
translated: It is the thorough investigation of those objects by the mental activity associated with that wisdom, by means of the discernment of the specific characteristics.🔽And these are the four investigations:🔽the investigation of meaning, of the truth, of phenomena, and of discernment.

original: de dag kyang dang po ni rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de dag kyang dang po ni rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The first is the investigation of meaning.

original: lhag ma gsum gyis ni rtogs pa de nyid bye brag tu bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma gsum gyis ni rtogs pa de nyid bye brag tu bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The other three are the investigation of the truth, of phenomena, and of discernment.

original: de la lhag mthong gi sgo gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lhag mthong gi sgo gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three doors of insight?

original: mtshan ma tsam @140b gyis rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su bcas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su btsal ba las so sor rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma tsam @140b gyis rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su bcas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su btsal ba las so sor rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o //
translated: 1. The one who is engaged in the mere sign, 2. the one who is engaged in the vow, and 3. the one who is engaged in the investigation of the search.🔽What is the one who is engaged in the mere sign?

original: de la mtshan ma tsam gyis rjes su zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshan ma tsam gyis rjes su zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: When one does not reflect,🔽does not ponder,🔽does not investigate,🔽does not examine,🔽does not analyze,🔽does not mentally construct,🔽does not mentally create,🔽does not mentally attend,🔽does not mentally attend to the mental orientation of one-pointedness of mind,

original: gang gi tshe dam chos thos pa dang gzung ba 'am /🔽dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid la byed pa yid la byed cing sems par mi byed /🔽rtog par mi byed /🔽'jal bar mi byed /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dam chos thos pa dang gzung ba 'am / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid la byed pa yid la byed cing sems par mi byed / rtog par mi byed / 'jal bar mi byed /
translated: Translation: འདི་ལྟ་སྟེ་དམ་པའི་ཆོས་ཉན་པ་དང་།ལེན་པ་དང་།

original: nye bar rtog par mi byed pa de'i tshe na ni mtshan ma tsam gyis rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar rtog par mi byed pa de'i tshe na ni mtshan ma tsam gyis rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
translated: At that time, one is engaged in the mere sign.🔽

original: yongs su btsal ba'i rjes su zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su btsal ba'i rjes su zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the one that is based on thorough searching?

original: gang gi dam pa'i chos thos pa dang gzung ba'am /
analyzed: gang gi dam pa'i chos thos pa dang gzung ba'am /
translated: It is the one who hears and upholds the sublime Dharma.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa de la mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed cing sems par byed rtog par byed 'jal bar byed nye bar rtog par byed pa de'i tshe na ni yongs su btsal ba'i rjes su🔽zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa de la mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed cing sems par byed rtog par byed 'jal bar byed nye bar rtog par byed pa de'i tshe na ni yongs su btsal ba'i rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
translated: When he attends to and reflects on the instruction and counsel of the spiritual teacher with the mental attention of meditative concentration, then he is engaged in the search for the object.

original: yongs su btsal ba la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su btsal ba la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the search for the object through discernment?

original: gang gi tshe bsams shing brtags la gzhal zhing nye bar brtags nas ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du so sor rtog par byed pa de'i tshe na ni yongs su btsal ba las so sor rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bsams shing brtags la gzhal zhing nye bar brtags nas ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du so sor rtog par byed pa de'i tshe na ni yongs su btsal ba las so sor rtog pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
translated: When he discerns the object as it is established through reflection, investigation, evaluation, and thorough analysis, then he is engaged in the search for the object through discernment.

original: de la lhag mthong gi gzhi rab tu dbye ba drug la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lhag mthong gi gzhi rab tu dbye ba drug la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the object of the differentiation of the basis of insight?

original: de dmigs pas yongs su tshol bar byed pa na gzhi rnam pa drug yongs su tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: de dmigs pas yongs su tshol bar byed pa na gzhi rnam pa drug yongs su tshol bar byed de /
translated: When he searches for the object, he searches for the six categories of the basis.

original: don dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed cing yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag la so sor rtog par byed do //
analyzed: don dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed cing yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag la so sor rtog par byed do //
translated: He seeks the meaning, the thing, the characteristics, the categories, the time, and the logic. Having sought them, he discerns them individually.

original: de la ji ltar na don yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na don yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
translated: How does he seek the meaning?

original: spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par spyod pa'i dmigs pa de dag la smras pa de'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de ltar don yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par spyod pa'i dmigs pa de dag la smras pa de'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de ltar don yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: He seeks the meaning of the words in the following way: “The object of purification of conduct, the object of purification of the learned, and the object of purification of the afflictions, have this meaning.”

original: ji ltar dngos po yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
translated: How does he seek the thing?

original: dmigs pa de dag nyid la dngos po rnam pa gnyis po nang gi dngos po dang / phyi rol gyi dngos po yongs su tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: dmigs pa de dag nyid la dngos po rnam pa gnyis po nang gi dngos po dang / phyi rol gyi dngos po yongs su tshol bar byed de /
translated: He seeks the two kinds of things in those very objects: internal things and external things.

original: de ltar dngos po yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dngos po yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: Thus he seeks the thing.

original: ji ltar mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
translated: How does he seek the characteristics?

original: dmigs pa de dag nyid la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis @141a * //
analyzed: dmigs pa de dag nyid la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis @141a * //
translated: He seeks the characteristics of those same objects in two ways:

original: po rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: po rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bar byed de /
translated: the specific characteristic and the general characteristic.

original: de ltar mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: Thus he seeks the characteristics.

original: ji ltar phyogs yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /🔽dmigs pa de dag nyid la phyogs rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: ji ltar phyogs yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / dmigs pa de dag nyid la phyogs rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: How does he seek the categories?🔽He seeks the categories of those same objects in two ways:

original: nag po'i phyogs dang / dkar po'i phyogs yongs su tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs dang / dkar po'i phyogs yongs su tshol bar byed de /
translated: the dark category and the bright category.

original: nag po'i phyogs ni skyon dang nyes dmigs kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs ni skyon dang nyes dmigs kyi sgo nas so //
translated: The dark category is in terms of faults and disadvantages.

original: dkar po'i phyogs ni yon tan dang phan yon gyi sgo nas te de ltar phyogs yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: dkar po'i phyogs ni yon tan dang phan yon gyi sgo nas te de ltar phyogs yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: The bright category is in terms of virtues and benefits. Thus he seeks the categories.

original: ji ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
translated: How does he seek the times?🔽He seeks the times of those same objects in three ways:

original: dmigs pa de dag nyid la dus gsum po 'dus pa'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig byung bar gyur to //
analyzed: dmigs pa de dag nyid la dus gsum po 'dus pa'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig byung bar gyur to //
translated: in the past, he thinks, “Such things occurred.”

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the future, he thinks, “Such things will occur.”

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig da ltar yod do zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig da ltar yod do zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: He investigates the present time, thinking, “Such and such exists in the present.”

original: ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na /
translated: How does he investigate the rational?

original: dmigs pa de nyid la rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang / bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang / 'thad pas bsgrubs pa'i rigs pa dang / chos nyid kyi rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed de /🔽de la ltos pa'i rigs pas ni kun rdzob kyang kun rdzob kyi sgo nas /
analyzed: dmigs pa de nyid la rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang / bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang / 'thad pas bsgrubs pa'i rigs pa dang / chos nyid kyi rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed de / de la ltos pa'i rigs pas ni kun rdzob kyang kun rdzob kyi sgo nas /
translated: He investigates the four principles of reason with regard to that very object: the principle of cause and effect, the principle of the accomplishment of the possible, and the principle of the nature of reality.

original: don dam pa yang don dam pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: don dam pa yang don dam pa'i sgo nas /
translated: By the principle of cause and effect, he investigates the conventional as conventional, and the ultimate as ultimate.

original: gzhi yang gzhi'i sgo nas yongs su tshol bar byed do //🔽bya ba byed pa'i rigs pas ni chos rnams kyi byed pa yongs su tshol bar byed de 'di ni chos so //🔽'di ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi yang gzhi'i sgo nas yongs su tshol bar byed do // bya ba byed pa'i rigs pas ni chos rnams kyi byed pa yongs su tshol bar byed de 'di ni chos so // 'di ni byed pa'o //
translated: By the principle of the accomplishment of the possible, he investigates the basis as basis.

original: 'di ni 'di'i byed pa'o zhes yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i byed pa'o zhes yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: By the principle of cause and effect, he investigates the activity of the dharmas, thinking, “This is the dharma, this is the activity, this is its activity.”🔽By the principle of the accomplishment of the possible, he investigates the accomplishment of the possible, thinking, “This is possible, this is not possible.”

original: 'thad pas bsgrubs pa'i rigs pas ni tshad ma gsum po yid ches pa'i lung dang / mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas yongs su tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: 'thad pas bsgrubs pa'i rigs pas ni tshad ma gsum po yid ches pa'i lung dang / mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas yongs su tshol bar byed de /
translated: One investigates with reasoning based on proof by means of the three kinds of valid cognition: valid scripture, direct perception, and inference.

original: ci 'di la yid ches pa'i lung yod dam med /
analyzed: ci 'di la yid ches pa'i lung yod dam med /
translated: One investigates by asking, “Is there a valid scripture for this or not?

original: ci mngon sum du dmigs sam /
analyzed: ci mngon sum du dmigs sam /
translated: Is it perceived by direct perception?

original: 'on te ma yin /
analyzed: 'on te ma yin /
translated: Or is it not?

original: ci rjes su dpag pas rigs sam /
analyzed: ci rjes su dpag pas rigs sam /
translated: Is it reasonable by inference?

original: 'on te ma yin zhes yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhes yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: Or is it not?”

original: chos nyid kyi rigs pas ni chos rnams kyi de ltar gyur pa nyid dang / grags pa'i chos nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid dang / gnas pa'i chos nyid la mos par byed cing sems par mi byed /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi rigs pas ni chos rnams kyi de ltar gyur pa nyid dang / grags pa'i chos nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid dang / gnas pa'i chos nyid la mos par byed cing sems par mi byed /
translated: One investigates with reasoning based on reality by being convinced of the reality of things as they are, the reality of what is generally accepted, the reality of what is inconceivable, and the reality of what is possible.

original: rnam par rtog par mi byed de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog par mi byed de /
translated: One does not reflect or conceive.

original: de ltar rigs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar rigs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do //
translated: This is how one investigates with reasoning.

original: de la ci'i phyir gzhi rab tu dbye ba rnam pa drug rnam par gzhag ce na /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir gzhi rab tu dbye ba rnam pa drug rnam par gzhag ce na /
translated: Why are the six kinds of bases established?

original: rtogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas @141b pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas @141b pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is based on three kinds of understanding.

original: smras pa'i don rtogs pa dang / dngos po'i mtha' rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: smras pa'i don rtogs pa dang / dngos po'i mtha' rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'o //
translated: understanding the meaning of what is said, understanding the limits of entities, and understanding reality as it is.

original: de la don yongs su tshol bas ni smras pa'i don rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la don yongs su tshol bas ni smras pa'i don rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Among these, by means of the investigation of the meaning, one understands the meaning of what is said.

original: dngos po yongs su tshol pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bas ni dngos po'i mtha' rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yongs su tshol pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su tshol bas ni dngos po'i mtha' rtogs pa yin no //
translated: By means of the investigation of entities and the investigation of the specific characteristics, one understands the limits of entities.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid yongs su tshol ba dang / phyogs yongs su tshol ba dang / dus yongs su tshol ba dang / rigs pa yongs su tshol bas ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid yongs su tshol ba dang / phyogs yongs su tshol ba dang / dus yongs su tshol ba dang / rigs pa yongs su tshol bas ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa yin te /
translated: By means of the investigation of the general characteristics, the investigation of the categories, the investigation of time, and the investigation of reason, one understands reality as it is.

original: rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ba ni smras pa'i don dang / shes bya'i dngos po'i ji snyed yod pa nyid dang ; ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid gang yin pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ba ni smras pa'i don dang / shes bya'i dngos po'i ji snyed yod pa nyid dang ; ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid gang yin pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of knowledge for a yogi is just the meaning of what is said and the existence of things that are objects of knowledge, both in terms of the diversity of phenomena and in terms of their mode of being.

original: de ltar sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhis bsdus pa sgo gsum dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhis bsdus pa sgo gsum dang ldan pa /
translated: The vipaśyanā that is distinguished by the attention of the path of preparation is included in the four types of activities of prajñā. It has three doors.

original: gzhi rab tu dbye ba rnam pa drug la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gzhi rab tu dbye ba rnam pa drug la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called “with concepts” because it focuses on the six categories of the basis.

original: des ni lhag mthong thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni lhag mthong thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
translated: That includes all forms of vipaśyanā.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba zhes bya ba'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba zhes bya ba'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mental image that is similar to the thing that is distinguished by the aspect of vipaśyanā with concepts is called “the image.”

original: shes bya'i dngos po gang zhe na /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the entity that is to be known?

original: spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa dang / mkhas pa'i dmigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong pa'i dmigs pa sngar bstan pa de dag go //
analyzed: spyad pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa dang / mkhas pa'i dmigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong pa'i dmigs pa sngar bstan pa de dag go //
translated: It is the object of observation for purifying behavior, the object of observation for expertise, and the object of observation for purifying the afflictions that were previously explained.

original: de dang cha mthun pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas dmigs pa de dag las gang yang rung ba mthong ba'am /🔽thos pa'am / yongs su brtags pa gcig gzung ste /🔽dam pa'i chos thos pa dang gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de dang cha mthun pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas dmigs pa de dag las gang yang rung ba mthong ba'am / thos pa'am / yongs su brtags pa gcig gzung ste / dam pa'i chos thos pa dang gzung ba'am /
translated: That which is similar to it is that a yogin sees, hears, or imagines one of those objects of observation.🔽Having taken hold of that, he or she relies on hearing the excellent teaching and retaining it,🔽or relies on the instructions and follow-up teachings of a spiritual guide.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la brten nas de nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa mngon du byas te /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la brten nas de nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa mngon du byas te /
translated: Then, he or she manifests the attention of the level of meditative equipoise and

original: de'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa yid la byed cing /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa yid la byed cing /
translated: brings to mind the aspect of that object of observation in order to make it appear to his or her mind.

original: de ltar mos pa yid la byed pa na /
analyzed: de ltar mos pa yid la byed pa na /
translated: When he or she brings to mind that which is imagined,

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa de'i mthus shes bya'i dngos po de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa de'i mthus shes bya'i dngos po de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The mental attention of the stage of meditative equipoise is the power of that.

original: de ni shes bya'i dngos po de nyid mngon sum du mthong ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni shes bya'i dngos po de nyid mngon sum du mthong ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The thing that appears in one's mind in an aspect similar to that object of knowledge is not the direct perception of that very object of knowledge.

original: de la brten nas mos pa yid la byas pa'i mthus de dang cha mthun pa'i rnam pa blo la @142a * //
analyzed: de la brten nas mos pa yid la byas pa'i mthus de dang cha mthun pa'i rnam pa blo la @142a * //
translated: But on the basis of that, through the power of mental attention that is directed toward it, an aspect that is similar to it appears to the mind.

original: snang ba yin pas na shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba yin pas na shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called similar to the object of knowledge.

original: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa de nyid kyi phyi rol shes bya'i dngos po ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa de nyid kyi phyi rol shes bya'i dngos po ma yin gyi /
translated: The so-called self-awareness of the mental image is not the external object of knowledge that is similar to it.

original: nang gi lhag mthong gi sems kyi rnam pa nyid gzugs brnyan dang rig pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nang gi lhag mthong gi sems kyi rnam pa nyid gzugs brnyan dang rig pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is the very aspect of the mind of insight that remains internally, because it appears in the form of an image and awareness.

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the conceptual mental image.

original: ci'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called a conceptual image?

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems des shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa yid la byas pas na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems de nyid
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems des shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa yid la byas pas na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems de nyid
translated: Because that mind in the aspect of conceptual insight, by means of attention that is a resolve to make the image of the object of knowledge appear in the mind,

original: gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: appears in the aspect of that image.

original: de bas na de ni lhag mthong gi rnam pas rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o //🔽gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i sgra yang dper na gzugs la ltos te gzugs brnyan snang ba ni gzugs la ltos te byung ba yin la /
analyzed: de bas na de ni lhag mthong gi rnam pas rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o // gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i sgra yang dper na gzugs la ltos te gzugs brnyan snang ba ni gzugs la ltos te byung ba yin la /
translated: Therefore it is called distinguished by the aspect of insight.🔽The word image is like, for example, the appearance of an image in dependence on form.

original: gzugs dang 'dra zhing gzugs las tha dad pa ma yin yang gzugs las logs shig na snang bas gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba bzhin du /
analyzed: gzugs dang 'dra zhing gzugs las tha dad pa ma yin yang gzugs las logs shig na snang bas gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba bzhin du /
translated: It arises in dependence on form, is similar to form, and is not different from form, but it appears as separate from form, and therefore it is called an image.

original: 'di ltar gzugs lta bur lta ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs lta bur lta ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems nyid yin la /
translated: Thus, seeing something like a form is the mind that has the aspect of the discernment that is associated with discursive thought.

original: gzugs brnyan lta bur blta ba ni sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa blo la snang ba yin te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan lta bur blta ba ni sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa blo la snang ba yin te /
translated: Seeing something like a reflection is the mind’s reflection of itself that appears to the mind.

original: gzugs brnyan de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems la ltos te byung ba yin la /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa'i sems la ltos te byung ba yin la /
translated: That reflection occurs in dependence on the mind that has the aspect of the discernment that is associated with discursive thought.

original: sems ji ltar mos pa de dang 'dra bar snang zhing /
analyzed: sems ji ltar mos pa de dang 'dra bar snang zhing /
translated: It appears in whatever way the mind is inclined.

original: sems nyid de ltar snang bar sems las tha dad par yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sems nyid de ltar snang bar sems las tha dad par yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not different from the mind that appears in that way.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa 'thob pa dang lhag mthong gi lam skye ba ni 'byung ba'i dus kyang gcig /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa 'thob pa dang lhag mthong gi lam skye ba ni 'byung ba'i dus kyang gcig /
translated: The time of the attainment of the object of the reflection that is associated with discursive thought and the arising of the path of discernment is the same.

original: ngo bo nyid dang gcig mod kyi rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyi spyod yul lta bur blo la snang bas na gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang gcig mod kyi rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyi spyod yul lta bur blo la snang bas na gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
translated: Although they are the same in essence, they are called “reflections” because they appear to the mind as if they were the domain of the mind that is associated with discursive thought.

original: gzhung gzhan las ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i gzugs bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa zhes 'byung ba yang 'di nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhung gzhan las ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i gzugs bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa zhes 'byung ba yang 'di nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Other texts state that form generated from concentration is undemonstrable and unimpeded and this is the same state.

original: de ltar mthong ba'i lhag mthong gi sems de ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhis bsdus pa sgo gsum dang ldan pa gzhi rab tu dbye ba @142b rnam pa drug la dmigs🔽pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba'i lhag mthong gi sems de ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa shes rab kyi spyod pa bzhis bsdus pa sgo gsum dang ldan pa gzhi rab tu dbye ba @142b rnam pa drug la dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The mind of vipaśyanā that sees in that way is the vipaśyanā that is distinguished by the attention of the mind of application. It is included in the four types of activity of prajñā. It possesses the three doors of liberation. It focuses on the six categories of the bases.

original: da dung mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa dang / mos pa las byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa las byung ba dang / dga' ba sdud pa dang / dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs yin gyi /
analyzed: da dung mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa dang / mos pa las byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa las byung ba dang / dga' ba sdud pa dang / dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs yin gyi /
translated: It is the state of the attention of recognizing individual characteristics, the attention arisen from belief, the attention arisen from isolation, the attention that gathers joy, and the attention of analysis.

original: sbyor ba mthar thug pa dang / sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu'i yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs ma yin pas /
analyzed: sbyor ba mthar thug pa dang / sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu'i yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs ma yin pas /
translated: It is not the state of the attention of the culmination of practice or the attention of the result of the culmination of practice.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called “with discursive thought.”

original: yang des shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de la yang dag par rtog par byed pa na yon tan dang skyon rnam par nges par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rnam par nges par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes
analyzed: yang des shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de la yang dag par rtog par byed pa na yon tan dang skyon rnam par nges par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rnam par nges par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes
translated: Moreover, when it correctly conceives the mental image of an object of knowledge that is similar to the thing, it is called “with definite conception” because it is associated with the definite conception of the qualities and faults of that object.

original: kyang bya'o // yang de rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las gzugs brnyan de yul gyi bye brag tu rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bye brag tu rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: kyang bya'o // yang de rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las gzugs brnyan de yul gyi bye brag tu rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bye brag tu rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is called “with specific conception” because it is associated with the conception of the specific object of the image of consciousness.

original: yang de gzugs brnyan de la rnam pa sna tshogs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sna tshogs su rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: yang de gzugs brnyan de la rnam pa sna tshogs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sna tshogs su rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is called “with various conceptions” because it is associated with the conception of the various aspects of that image.

original: yang de gzugs brnyan de rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: yang de gzugs brnyan de rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, that image is the essence of consciousness.

original: gnyis med pa la gnyis su 'gal bar rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir 'gal bar rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya ste /
analyzed: gnyis med pa la gnyis su 'gal bar rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir 'gal bar rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes kyang bya ste /
translated: It is also called “associated with the conception of contradiction” because it is contradictory for the non-dual to be conceived as dual.

original: de dag ni rnam bar rtog pa dang bcas pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni rnam bar rtog pa dang bcas pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: These are the synonyms for that conception.

original: gzugs brnyan de ni gzugs brnyan zhes kyang bya /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de ni gzugs brnyan zhes kyang bya /
translated: That reflection is also called a reflection,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi yul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / yid la byed pa'i rten dang / nang du rnam par rtog pa'i lus dang / snang brnyan zhes kyang bya ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi yul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / yid la byed pa'i rten dang / nang du rnam par rtog pa'i lus dang / snang brnyan zhes kyang bya ste /
translated: a sign of meditative concentration, an object that is the domain of meditative concentration, a method of meditative concentration, a door of meditative concentration, a basis of mental activity, a body of internal conception, and an image.

original: de dag ni gzugs brnyan de'i ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni gzugs brnyan de'i ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: These are the synonyms for that reflection.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi rnam pas rab tu phye ba shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi rnam pas rab tu phye ba shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The so-called non-conceptual image is the mental image of the mind that is similar to the entity of the object of knowledge and is distinguished by the aspect of calm abiding.

original: de la rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa thob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa sems gnas pa dgus bsdus pa /
analyzed: de la rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa thob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa sems gnas pa dgus bsdus pa /
translated: Non-conceptual means the mental state that is distinguished by the path of obtaining attention, which is included in the nine mental states of calm abiding,

original: stobs drug dang ldan pa yid la byed pa bzhis 'jug pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: stobs drug dang ldan pa yid la byed pa bzhis 'jug pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: and which is engaged by the four attentions that possess the six powers.

original: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin @143a * //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin @143a * //
translated: Image means the mental image of the mind that is similar to the entity of the object of knowledge and is distinguished by the aspect of non-conceptual calm abiding.

original: rgyud gcig tu byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud gcig tu byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du byed pa'o //

analyzed: phyi rol gyi dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par bsdus te /
translated: He gathers all external objects and

analyzed: rnam par mi g-yeng bar bya ba'i phyir dang po nyid du nye bar rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: he places the mind by first investigating it in order to prevent distraction.

original: ji ltar yang dag par 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does he correctly place the mind?

original: dang por nye bar brtags pa'i sems gang yin pa de g-yo ba dang / rags pa dang / yang dag par mi gnas pa dang / yongs su mi gnas par gyur na de dmigs pa de nyid la brtod pa'i tshul dang / dang bar bya ba'i tshul gyis mngon par tshar bcad pa dang bcas pas phra bar byed cing /

translated: When the mind that was previously examined becomes unsteady, coarse, not still, and not settled, then, with regard to that very object, it is pacified by the method of binding and the method of refreshing, and it becomes subtle.

original: mngon par g-yeng bar mi byed pa gang yin pa da ni yang dag par 'jog bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par g-yeng bar mi byed pa gang yin pa da ni yang dag par 'jog bar byed pa yin no //
translated: When it is not distracted, then it is correctly placed.

original: ji ltar na bsdus te 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsdus te 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it collected and placed?

original: de ltar de'i sems gzhag pa dang / yang dag par gzhag pa de gal te brjed ngas pas phyi rol du rnam par g-yeng bar gyur na de yang phyis de nyid la sdud par byed de /
analyzed: de ltar de'i sems gzhag pa dang / yang dag par gzhag pa de gal te brjed ngas pas phyi rol du rnam par g-yeng bar gyur na de yang phyis de nyid la sdud par byed de /

original: de ltar na bsdus te 'jog par byed pa yin no ;
analyzed: de ltar na bsdus te 'jog par byed pa yin no ;
translated: In this way, it is collected and placed.

original: / ji ltar na nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: / ji ltar na nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na /

original: dang po kho nar de lta de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag ste gnas shing sems de yang dag par 'jog par byed pa na /
analyzed: dang po kho nar de lta de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag ste gnas shing sems de yang dag par 'jog par byed pa na /
translated: First, he establishes mindfulness in this way and abides in it.

original: ci nas kyang de'i sems de phyi rol du mi 'phro bar byed de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang de'i sems de phyi rol du mi 'phro bar byed de /

original: de ltar na nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: This is how he establishes it.

original: ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa @143b yin zhe na /🔽gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i mtshan ma'am /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa @143b yin zhe na / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i mtshan ma'am /
translated: How does he control it?🔽He controls the mind so that it does not scatter to the signs of forms, sounds, smells, tastes, and touchables,

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang / gti mug dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma gang gis de'i sems rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang / gti mug dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma gang gis de'i sems rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur na /
translated: or to the signs of men, women, desire, hatred, and ignorance.

original: de la des dang po nyid nas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes su bzung ba de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de la des dang po nyid nas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes su bzung ba de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /
translated: From the very beginning, he has taken up the notion of danger in regard to those signs.

original: mtshan ma de dag la de'i sems 'phror mi ster bar byed de /
analyzed: mtshan ma de dag la de'i sems 'phror mi ster bar byed de /
translated: He does not allow the mind to scatter to those signs.

original: de ltar na dul bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na dul bar byed pa yin no //
translated: This is how he controls it.

original: ji ltar na zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does he pacify it?

original: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa gang dag dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang dag gis de'i sems kun tu 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa gang dag dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang dag gis de'i sems kun tu 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: When his mind is disturbed by the discursive thoughts of desire, etc., and by the secondary defilements of attachment to desire, etc.,

original: de la des dang po nyid nas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes su bzung ba de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas rnam par rtog pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag las de'i sems 'phror mi ster bar byed de /
analyzed: de la des dang po nyid nas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes su bzung ba de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas rnam par rtog pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag las de'i sems 'phror mi ster bar byed de /
translated: he does not allow his mind to be carried away by these discursive thoughts and secondary defilements, because he has taken hold of the idea of the danger of these from the very beginning.

original: de ltar na zhi bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na zhi bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus he pacifies.

original: ji ltar na nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does he appease?

original: de brjed ngas pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de gnyis ka kun du 'byung bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de brjed ngas pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de gnyis ka kun du 'byung bar 'gyur na /
translated: When both discursive thought and secondary defilement arise because of his forgetfulness,

original: byung ngo cog dang du mi len cing spong bar byed de /
analyzed: byung ngo cog dang du mi len cing spong bar byed de /
translated: he does not accept their appearance and he rejects them.

original: de ltar na nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus he appeases.

original: ji ltar na rgyud gcig tu byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rgyud gcig tu byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does he unify his mind?

original: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas bar du chad pa med pa dang / rgyun chags par ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun la 'jog par byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas bar du chad pa med pa dang / rgyun chags par ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun la 'jog par byed de /
translated: He places the mind in the stream of concentration with effort and without interruption, and he places it in the stream of concentration with continuity.

original: de ltar na rgyud gcig tu byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyud gcig tu byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus he makes the mind one-pointed.

original: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin du byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin du byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does he make the mind concentrated?🔽By the cause of frequent practice, he attains and actualizes the path of effortless engagement and natural engagement.

original: kun du brten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus lhun gyis grub pa'i 'jug pa dang / rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i lam thob cing mngon du byed pa med pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa de nyid kyis de'i sems de rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: kun du brten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus lhun gyis grub pa'i 'jug pa dang / rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i lam thob cing mngon du byed pa med pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa de nyid kyis de'i sems de rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: By that very effortless engagement, his mind enters the stream of concentration without distraction.

original: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin du byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus he makes the mind concentrated.

original: de la stobs drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stobs drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six powers?

original: thos pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / shes bzhin gyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / yongs su 'dris pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: thos pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / shes bzhin gyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / yongs su 'dris pa'i stobs so //
translated: The power of hearing, the power of reflection, the power of mindfulness, the power of introspection, the power of vigor, and the power of thorough acquaintance.

original: stobs drug po de dag gis sems gnas pa dgu po de dag 'grub ste /🔽de la thos pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs kyis ni re zhig thos pa gang yin pa dang / bsam pa gang yin pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: stobs drug po de dag gis sems gnas pa dgu po de dag 'grub ste / de la thos pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs kyis ni re zhig thos pa gang yin pa dang / bsam pa gang yin pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: These nine mental states are achieved by means of these six powers.

original: dang po kho nar sems dmigs pa la @144a * //🔽'jog par byed pa dang / de nyid la brtod pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: dang po kho nar sems dmigs pa la @144a * // 'jog par byed pa dang / de nyid la brtod pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 'jog par byed do //
translated: By the power of hearing and the power of reflection, one first places the mind on the object of meditation and then fixes it there by the method of restraint.🔽By the power of mindfulness, one gathers in and fixes the mind when it has been placed in this way, and by the power of introspection, one fixes the mind when it is distracted.

original: dran pa'i stobs kyis ni de ltar sems gtad pa las yang dag par bsdus pa dang / rnam par mi g-yeng bar byed bas bsdus te 'jog pa dang nye bar 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa'i stobs kyis ni de ltar sems gtad pa las yang dag par bsdus pa dang / rnam par mi g-yeng bar byed bas bsdus te 'jog pa dang nye bar 'jog par byed do //
translated: By the power of vigor, one generates enthusiasm for fixing the mind.🔽By the power of thorough acquaintance, one fixes the mind in a state of ease.

original: shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni de nas rnam par rtog pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma dag la 'phro bar mi byed pas dul bar byed pa dang zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni de nas rnam par rtog pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma dag la 'phro bar mi byed pas dul bar byed pa dang zhi bar byed do //
translated: By the power of wisdom, he then calms and pacifies the mind, since he does not allow it to scatter toward the signs of discursive thought and secondary defilement.

original: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni de gnyis ka dang du mi len pa dang / rgyun chags par ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun la 'jog par byed pas nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang rgyud gcig tu byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni de gnyis ka dang du mi len pa dang / rgyun chags par ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun la 'jog par byed pas nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang rgyud gcig tu byed do //
translated: By the power of vigor, he completely pacifies and unifies the mind, since he does not tolerate either of them and he fixes the mind in a continuous flow of concentration.

original: yongs su 'dris pa'i stobs kyis ni ting nge 'dzin du byed do //
analyzed: yongs su 'dris pa'i stobs kyis ni ting nge 'dzin du byed do //
translated: By the power of thorough acquaintance, he concentrates the mind.

original: yid la byed pa bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: yid la byed pa bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four attentions?

original: bsgrims te 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa dang / skabs su 'chad cing 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa dang / skabs su 'chad pa med par 'jug pa yid la byed pa dang / rtsol ba med par 'jug pa yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrims te 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa dang / skabs su 'chad cing 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa dang / skabs su 'chad pa med par 'jug pa yid la byed pa dang / rtsol ba med par 'jug pa yid la byed pa'o //
translated: Attention that is tight, attention that is loosened, attention that is neither tight nor loosened, and attention that is neither tight nor loosened, and is effortless.

original: sems gnas pa dgu po de dag ni yid la byed pa de bzhis 'jug ste /
analyzed: sems gnas pa dgu po de dag ni yid la byed pa de bzhis 'jug ste /
translated: These four attentions engage the nine states of mind that are still.

original: de la 'jog par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'jog par byed pa ni bsgrims te 'jug pa'i yid la byed pas 'jug go //
analyzed: de la 'jog par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'jog par byed pa ni bsgrims te 'jug pa'i yid la byed pas 'jug go //
translated: The first two mental attentions are the mental attention of tight focus.🔽The next five mental attentions are the mental attention of intermittent focus.

original: bsdus te 'jog par byed pa dang / nye bar 'jog par byed pa dang / dul bar byed pa dang / zhi bar byed pa dang / nye bar zhi bar byed pa ni skabs su 'chad cing 'jug pa'i yid la byed pas 'jug go //🔽rgyud gcig tu byed pa ni skabs su 'chad pa med par yid la byed pas 'jug go //
analyzed: bsdus te 'jog par byed pa dang / nye bar 'jog par byed pa dang / dul bar byed pa dang / zhi bar byed pa dang / nye bar zhi bar byed pa ni skabs su 'chad cing 'jug pa'i yid la byed pas 'jug go // rgyud gcig tu byed pa ni skabs su 'chad pa med par yid la byed pas 'jug go //
translated: The next mental attention is the mental attention of uninterrupted focus.

original: ting nge 'dzin du byed pa ni rtsol ba med bar 'jug pa'i yid la byed pas 'jug ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du byed pa ni rtsol ba med bar 'jug pa'i yid la byed pas 'jug ste /
translated: The last mental attention is the mental attention of effortless focus.

original: de ltar yid la byed pa bzhi po de dag ni sems gnas pa dgu po dag la ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yid la byed pa bzhi po de dag ni sems gnas pa dgu po dag la ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs yin no //
translated: Thus, these four mental attentions are the side of serenity in the nine mental states.

original: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas thob pa lhag mthong la rab tu rtsol bar byed pa la ni lhag mthong gi phyogs kyang yin te /
analyzed: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas thob pa lhag mthong la rab tu rtsol bar byed pa la ni lhag mthong gi phyogs kyang yin te /
translated: When one who has attained inner mental serenity strives in insight, they are also the side of insight.

original: de ltar yid la byed pa thob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa sems gnas pa dgus bsdus pa stobs drug dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bzhis 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar yid la byed pa thob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa sems gnas pa dgus bsdus pa stobs drug dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bzhis 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, the mental attention that is distinguished by the path of obtaining mental attention, which is included in the nine states of mind that are aspects of serenity, and which is engaged by means of the four mental attentions that possess the six powers, is called “non-discursive.”

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa des rab tu phye ba shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mental image that is similar to the entity and aspect of the object of knowledge, which is distinguished by that non-discursive aspect of serenity, and which is self-awareness, is called “image.”

original: shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun @144b pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun @144b pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: “Similar to the entity and aspect of the object of knowledge” is as above.

original: sngar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa la brten nas /
analyzed: sngar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i lhag mthong gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pa la brten nas /
translated: Previously, on the basis of mental attention in the state of meditative equipoise with conceptual discernment,

original: shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa yid la byas sam de kho na nyid yid la byas te /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang gi blo la snang bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa yid la byas sam de kho na nyid yid la byas te /
translated: In order to make the aspects of the objects of knowledge appear to one's mind, one should attend to them with interest or attend to reality.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob pa de nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob pa de nyid do //
translated: One attains the object of a conceptual image.

original: de la bye brag tu na 'dir ni gzugs brnyan de nyid la lhag mthong gi rnam pas mos par mi byed par zhi gnas kyi rnam pas de kho na nyid yid la byed pa sems kyi ngo bo nyid du yid la byed cing /
analyzed: de la bye brag tu na 'dir ni gzugs brnyan de nyid la lhag mthong gi rnam pas mos par mi byed par zhi gnas kyi rnam pas de kho na nyid yid la byed pa sems kyi ngo bo nyid du yid la byed cing /
translated: In this regard, in particular, here one does not attend to reality with the aspects of insight, but with the aspects of serenity, one attends to the nature of mind, which is the very same image.

original: rtse gcig tu mnyam par byed do //
analyzed: rtse gcig tu mnyam par byed do //
translated: One makes it one-pointed and equal.

original: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa zhes bya ba yang snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa zhes bya ba yang snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The so-called image of mind is self-knowing, as before.

original: shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa de nyid phyi rol gyi shes bya'i dngos po ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes bya'i dngos po dang cha mthun pa de nyid phyi rol gyi shes bya'i dngos po ma yin gyi /
translated: That image is similar to the object of knowledge, but it is not an external object of knowledge.

original: nang gi zhi gnas kyi sems kyi rnam pa nyid gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nang gi zhi gnas kyi sems kyi rnam pa nyid gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is the very aspect of the internal mind of serenity, which appears as the image of self-knowing.

original: de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the non-conceptual image.

original: ci'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called the non-conceptual image?

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa'i sems des /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa'i sems des /
translated: Because that mind in the aspect of non-conceptual calm abiding

original: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de nyid la kho na nyid yid la byed pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid du yid la byed cing /
analyzed: sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de nyid la kho na nyid yid la byed pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid du yid la byed cing /
translated: only attends to the reality of the self-awareness of the mental image.

original: rtse gcig tu mnyam par 'jog pa na rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa'i sems de nyid gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtse gcig tu mnyam par 'jog pa na rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa'i sems de nyid gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de lta bur snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: When it is single-pointedly placed in equipoise, that very mind in the aspect of non-conceptual calm abiding appears in the form of that image.

original: de bas na de nyid ni zhi gnas kyi rnam pas rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de nyid ni zhi gnas kyi rnam pas rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the differentiation by the aspect of calm abiding.

original: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i sgra yang snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i sgra yang snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The term image is as before.

original: 'dir gzugs brnyan lta bur lta ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa'i sems nyid yin la ;
analyzed: 'dir gzugs brnyan lta bur lta ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa'i sems nyid yin la ;
translated: Here, seeing like an image is the very mind in the aspect of non-conceptual calm abiding.

original: gzugs brnyan lta bur lta ba ni sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa blo la snang ba yin te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan lta bur lta ba ni sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa blo la snang ba yin te /
translated: The view that it is like a reflection is the appearance to the mind of the mental reflection of self-awareness.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob pa dang / zhi gnas kyi lam skye ba ni 'byung ba'i dus kyang gcig / ngo bo nyid dang gcig pa nyid kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems kyi spyod yul lta bur blo la snang bas na gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob pa dang / zhi gnas kyi lam skye ba ni 'byung ba'i dus kyang gcig / ngo bo nyid dang gcig pa nyid kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems kyi spyod yul lta bur blo la snang bas na gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
translated: The attainment of the object of nondiscriminating reflection and the arising of the path of serenity are the same time, and because it appears to the mind as the object of the nondiscriminating mind of identity with reality, it is called reflection.🔽The mind of serenity that sees in this way is the path of attaining attention, and it is the serenity that is distinguished by the nine mental states of serenity, and it is the attention endowed with the six powers.

original: de ltar mthong ba'i zhi gnas kyi sems de ni yid la byed pa thob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa sems gnas pa dgus bsdus pa stobs drug dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bzhis 'jug pa yin la /🔽sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam @145a * //
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba'i zhi gnas kyi sems de ni yid la byed pa thob pa'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pa sems gnas pa dgus bsdus pa stobs drug dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bzhis 'jug pa yin la / sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam @145a * //
translated: It is the attention of the four kinds of attention.

original: gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs yin pas de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs yin pas de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the state of attention of the path of ultimate union, and therefore it is called nondiscriminating.

original: yang des sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de la lhag mthong gi rnam pas rnam par 'byed par mi byed /🔽rab tu rnam par 'byed par mi byed /
analyzed: yang des sems kyi gzugs brnyan rang rig pa de la lhag mthong gi rnam pas rnam par 'byed par mi byed / rab tu rnam par 'byed par mi byed /
translated: Moreover, it does not discern that self-knowing mind that is the mental image with the aspects of insight.🔽It does not thoroughly discern it.

original: yongs su rtog par mi byed /
analyzed: yongs su rtog par mi byed /
translated: It does not investigate it.

original: yongs su dpyod par mi byed par dmigs pa'i mtshan ma de nyid mi gtong ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pas sems nang kho nar 'jog par byed /
analyzed: yongs su dpyod par mi byed par dmigs pa'i mtshan ma de nyid mi gtong ba'i zhi gnas kyi rnam pas sems nang kho nar 'jog par byed /
translated: It does not analyze it. It does not let go of the sign of the objective mental image. It is calm abiding that is only internal placement of the mind.

original: yang dag par 'jog par byed /
analyzed: yang dag par 'jog par byed /
translated: It is correct placement.

original: bsdus te 'jog par byed /🔽nye bar 'jog par byed /
analyzed: bsdus te 'jog par byed / nye bar 'jog par byed /
translated: It is placement through gathering.🔽It is close placement.

original: dul bar byed /🔽zhi bar byed /
analyzed: dul bar byed / zhi bar byed /
translated: It is disciplined.🔽It is pacified.

original: nye bar zhi bar byed /
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar byed /
translated: It is thoroughly pacified.

original: rgyud gcig tu byed /
analyzed: rgyud gcig tu byed /
translated: It is a single continuum.

original: ting nge 'dzin du byed pas na rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du byed pas na rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is concentration. Therefore, it is called non-conceptuality.

original: sngar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i rnam grangs ji skad bstan pa dag pas bzlog pa'i rnam grangs thams cad kyang de bzhin du ci rigs par sbyar te /
analyzed: sngar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i rnam grangs ji skad bstan pa dag pas bzlog pa'i rnam grangs thams cad kyang de bzhin du ci rigs par sbyar te /
translated: All the synonyms that were previously taught with concepts should be applied in the same way to the synonyms that are the opposite of those.

original: de dag ni rnam par mi rtog pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni rnam par mi rtog pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs yin no //
translated: These are the synonyms of that non-imagination.

original: gzugs brnyan gyi ming gi rnam grangs ni snga ma kho na bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi ming gi rnam grangs ni snga ma kho na bzhin no //
translated: The synonyms of the reflection are the same as before.

original: bye brag tu na snga ma ni lhag mthong gis rab tu phye ba yin pa 'di ni zhi gnas kyis rab tu phye ba yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu na snga ma ni lhag mthong gis rab tu phye ba yin pa 'di ni zhi gnas kyis rab tu phye ba yin te /
translated: In particular, the former is distinguished by insight, and this is distinguished by serenity.

original: de gnyis ka la yang lhag mthong dang zhi gnas gnyis ka'i cha yong med kyi zung du 'brel ba'i lam ma thob pa'i gnas skabs na /
analyzed: de gnyis ka la yang lhag mthong dang zhi gnas gnyis ka'i cha yong med kyi zung du 'brel ba'i lam ma thob pa'i gnas skabs na /
translated: In both of those, when one has not attained the path that is the union of the two, insight and serenity,

original: snga ma ni dmigs pa ma thob pa thob par byed pa yin pas rtog ba'i shas che ba'i phyir lhag mthong gis rab tu phye ba zhes bya /
analyzed: snga ma ni dmigs pa ma thob pa thob par byed pa yin pas rtog ba'i shas che ba'i phyir lhag mthong gis rab tu phye ba zhes bya /
translated: the former is distinguished by insight because it is predominantly conceptual, since it causes one to attain the object of meditation that has not been attained.

original: 'di ni dmigs pa thob pa goms par byed pa yin pas rtogs pa shas chung ba'i phyir zhi gnas kyis rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dmigs pa thob pa goms par byed pa yin pas rtogs pa shas chung ba'i phyir zhi gnas kyis rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is distinguished by serenity because it is predominantly non-conceptual, since it causes one to become familiar with the object of meditation that has been attained.

original: dngos po'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni zung du 'brel bas rab tu phye ba dmigs pa dang gnas kyi dngos po'i mtha' gnas gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni zung du 'brel bas rab tu phye ba dmigs pa dang gnas kyi dngos po'i mtha' gnas gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa ste /
translated: The limit of entities is the very essence of the transformation of the entity that is the objective support and basis that is distinguished by being a union.

original: de la dngos po zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi dmigs pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas ba'i gzugs brnyan dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dngos po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la dngos po zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi dmigs pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas ba'i gzugs brnyan dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dngos po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The entity is the entity that is the objective support and basis of both the image with conception and the image without conception that is insight and serenity.

original: mtha' zhes bya ba ni de'i ji snyed yod pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid kyi mthar gyur pa gnas gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: mtha' zhes bya ba ni de'i ji snyed yod pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid kyi mthar gyur pa gnas gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The limit is the limit of the extent of the existence of the entity that is the foundation consciousness, which is the transformation of the very essence of the entity that is the objective support and basis.

original: de ci'i phyir dmigs pa de nyid la dngos po zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir dmigs pa de nyid la dngos po zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is that objective support called the entity?

original: de gnyis ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dngos po'i dmigs pa dang gnas kyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de gnyis ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dngos po'i dmigs pa dang gnas kyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because it is the entity that is the objective support and basis of both serenity and insight.

original: de la dmigs pa'i dngos po'i zhes bya @145b ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni dmigs pa gang gis bskyad pa de nyid la dmigs pa yin pas mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i mos pa'i yid la byed pa dang / de kho na nyid yid la byed pa'i mthus rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /🔽rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob par gyur pa des zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bskyed la /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i dngos po'i zhes bya @145b ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni dmigs pa gang gis bskyad pa de nyid la dmigs pa yin pas mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i mos pa'i yid la byed pa dang / de kho na nyid yid la byed pa'i mthus rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob par gyur pa des zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bskyed la /

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yang gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa de nyid la dmigs par byed pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid de'i dmigs pa'i dngos🔽po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yang gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa de nyid la dmigs par byed pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid de'i dmigs pa'i dngos🔽po zhes bya'o //
translated: The object of observation of the entity of serenity and insight is the object of observation of the entity of serenity and insight.🔽The object of observation of the entity of serenity and insight is the object of observation of the entity of

original: de la gnas kyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad kyi gnas kyi dngos po yin pas mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i mos pa'i yid la byed pa dang / de kho na nyid yid la byed pa'i mthus rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: de la gnas kyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad kyi gnas kyi dngos po yin pas mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i mos pa'i yid la byed pa dang / de kho na nyid yid la byed pa'i mthus rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /
translated: The so called substantial basis is the foundation consciousness, the substantial basis of all phenomena of the mind and mental factors.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob par gyur pa de ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin la /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa thob par gyur pa de ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin la /
translated: The substantial basis of the foundation consciousness is obtained through the power of attention that is interest on the level of meditative equipoise and attention that is the reality of the object.

original: dmigs pa de la brten te skyes pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i sems las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de ni sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid de'i gnas kyi dngos po zhes bya ste /
