original: yangs pa dang 'phel ba dang rgyas par gyur pa de tsam du sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi ngo bo nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba 'di yang yangs pa dang / 'phel ba dang /🔽rgyas par 'gyur la /
analyzed: yangs pa dang 'phel ba dang rgyas par gyur pa de tsam du sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi ngo bo nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba 'di yang yangs pa dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur la /
translated: To the extent that the essence and divisions of insight are extensive, increased and expanded by the mental contemplation of the final path of application, to that extent the essence and divisions of serenity are also extensive, increased and expanded by the mental contemplation of the final path of application.

original: ji tsam du lhag mthong gi ngo bo nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba 'di spangs pa dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par gyur pa de tsam du mtshan ma'i dbye ba dang gnas ngan len gyi g-yeng ba zhi ba'i zhi gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang yangs pa dag 'phel ba dang rgyas par gyur te /
analyzed: ji tsam du lhag mthong gi ngo bo nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba 'di spangs pa dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par gyur pa de tsam du mtshan ma'i dbye ba dang gnas ngan len gyi g-yeng ba zhi ba'i zhi gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang yangs pa dag 'phel ba dang rgyas par gyur te /
translated: To the extent that the essence and divisions of insight are abandoned, increased and expanded, to that extent the essence of serenity that pacifies the distraction of differentiation and the distraction of physical and mental dysfunction is also abandoned, increased and expanded.

original: de ltar na chos gnyis po zhi gnas kyi lam dang / lhag mthong gi lam de gnyis ni gcig la gcig brten pa dang / gcig la gcig rag las pa yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na chos gnyis po zhi gnas kyi lam dang / lhag mthong gi lam de gnyis ni gcig la gcig brten pa dang / gcig la gcig rag las pa yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: Thus these two phenomena, the path of serenity and the path of insight, should be understood as mutually dependent and mutually reliant.

original: de yan chad ni zung du 'brel par 'jug pa'i lam dang dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su @158a * //
analyzed: de yan chad ni zung du 'brel par 'jug pa'i lam dang dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su @158a * //
translated: Up to this point, one obtains the object of observation of the path of union, the limit of entities, and the complete accomplishment of the purpose.

original: grub pa'i dmigs pa 'thob cing sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu'i yid la byed pa nyid la sbyor bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i dmigs pa 'thob cing sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu'i yid la byed pa nyid la sbyor bar rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that one is connected to the mental contemplation that is the result of the culmination of application.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'i tshig yin te /
translated: Thus, a bodhisattva is skilled in insight. This is a concluding statement.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi ngo bo nyid la gnyis med pa'i don rang rig pa'i rnam pas yid la byed pa ni lhag mthong la mkhas pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes nges par shes par byed do
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi ngo bo nyid la gnyis med pa'i don rang rig pa'i rnam pas yid la byed pa ni lhag mthong la mkhas pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes nges par shes par byed do
translated: The word thus causes one to understand with certainty that a bodhisattva is skilled in insight by way of the mental contemplation that is the nondual object of the intrinsic reality of mind, which is reflexively aware, and not by any other means.

original: // lhag mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i chos rnams rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir lta ba ni lhag mthong zhes bya'o //🔽mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: // lhag mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i chos rnams rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir lta ba ni lhag mthong zhes bya'o // mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Insight is called vipaśyanā because it is the view of phenomena that possess specific and general characteristics.🔽One is skilled in insight means that one is skilled in insight that is distinguished by the attention of the path of preparation.

original: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste /
translated: One is skilled in insight means that one is skilled in insight that is distinguished by the attention of the path of no learning.

original: de tsam gyis na lhag mthong thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽thob pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: de tsam gyis na lhag mthong thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // thob pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
translated: This is the meaning of one who has attained insight.🔽The meaning of the words that explain the attainment of insight have been explained.

translated: It is concomitant with the attention that is compatible with physical and mental pliancy, which is the meditative serenity that is free of the distraction of the unruliness of the path of preparation.

translated: Therefore, it is the means of attaining the complete path of meditative serenity that is distinguished by the attention of the path of preparation.

analyzed: / ji srid du lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ma thob pa de'i bar du zhes bya ni ji srid du sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas gnas ngan len gyi g-yeng ba lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa nyid ma thob pa de'i bar du'o // ji ltar legs par bsams pa'i chos de dag nang du ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan du yid la bgyid pa de la ci zhes bgyi zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i
translated: means that as long as one has not attained the pliancy of body and mind that is the remedy for the distraction of negative tendencies, which is the śamatha that is distinguished by the attention of the path of culmination of application.🔽What is that called when one attends to those phenomena that have been well contemplated as the reflection that is the object of samādhi?

original: gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa yid la byed pa de la ci zhes bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa yid la byed pa de la ci zhes bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: lhag mthong ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas gnas ngan len gyi g-yeng ba zhi ba lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa
analyzed: lhag mthong ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas gnas ngan len gyi g-yeng ba zhi ba lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa
translated: When the path of insight is complete, one attains the state of mind that is the culmination of the path of preparation, and one attains physical and mental pliability, which is the pacification of the distraction of the negative tendencies of meditative serenity.

original: de thob nas de nyid la gnas te sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong sems @159b kyi ngo bo nyid la gnyis med pa'i don rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid dang rab tu dbye ba thob pa yin gyi
analyzed: de thob nas de nyid la gnas te sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong sems @159b kyi ngo bo nyid la gnyis med pa'i don rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid dang rab tu dbye ba thob pa yin gyi
translated: Having attained that, one remains in it and attains the state of mind that is the culmination of the path of preparation, and one attains insight, which is the discernment of the nature of the mind, the meaning of nonduality.

original: / 'di ni sbyor ba'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i skabs na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa yid la byed pa tsam du zad pa dang / da dung lhag mthong gi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

translated: But this is merely the attention to the object of a conceptual image during the stage of attention on the path of preparation, and the path of insight is not yet complete.

original: 'o na de la ci zhes bya snyam pa la lhag mthong gi rjes su mthun pa'i mos pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin par brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /

translated: It is said that it is associated with the interest that is compatible with insight.

original: de ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i lhag mthong sems kyi ngo bo nyid la gnyis med pa'i don rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rab tu dbye ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i mos pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin pas /

translated: That is, the insight that is the mental attention of the path of culmination is the essence of mind, the meaning of nonduality, the essence of reflexive awareness, and it is associated with the interest that is compatible with the classification of that.

original: de'i phyir sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba'i lhag mthong gi lam yongs su rdzogs pa de'i 'thob pa'i thabs yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: 'thob pa'i thabs kyi tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /

original: chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa 'di las rab tu nyams shing chud za bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i

translated: The treatise is called Determining the Presentation in order to prevent loss. The meaning of this is as follows: In order to prevent the complete degeneration and loss of this teaching, which is the essence of the path of shamatha and vipashyana that are included in yoga,

analyzed: phyir bstan pa dang bshad pa gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //

analyzed: phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / sgom pa'i rgyu mtshan yongs su shes pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / zhi gnas tsam gyis chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / phra ba kun tu 'byung bas yongs su shes pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / stong pa nyid la skrag pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang /
translated: the ascertainment of designations in order to not waste the complete understanding of the cause of meditation, the ascertainment of designations in order to destroy manifest conceit and not waste it,🔽the ascertainment of designations in order to not waste mere śamatha, the ascertainment of designations in order to not waste the complete understanding of the arising of the subtle, and the ascertainment of designations in order to destroy fear of emptiness and not waste it.

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa la ngo bo nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / las dang / sbyor ba dang / 'jug pa'i don las brtsams te /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa la ngo bo nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / las dang / sbyor ba dang / 'jug pa'i don las brtsams te /
translated: The ascertainment of designations in order to not waste the cultivation of śamatha and vipaśyanā is to be understood in terms of their nature, cause, result, function, preparation, and engagement.

original: gdams ngag gi sbyin pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / bsgom pa la 'dun pa drag po med pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: gdams ngag gi sbyin pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa dang / bsgom pa la 'dun pa drag po med pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the designation for the purpose of not wasting the gift of instruction. The ascertainment of the designation for the purpose of not wasting the intense aspiration for meditation.

original: de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of the designation for the purpose of not wasting the samadhi of the stage of non-conceptual wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang / lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi 'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang / lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi 'am /
translated: Bhagavan, is the path of shamatha and the path of vipashyana said to be different?

original: tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or are they not different?

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of the designation for the purpose of not wasting the realization of non-conceptual wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par lta bar bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par lta bar bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, the object of the samadhi of various views, which is a reflection, is that... and so on.

original: rgyu mtshan gsum bsgom pa'i dus mi shes pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gsum bsgom pa'i dus mi shes pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation is for the purpose of destroying and not wasting the time of meditation on the three reasons.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam gyis ni gcig tu lhag mthong bsgom pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam gyis ni gcig tu lhag mthong bsgom pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, to what extent is a bodhisattva cultivating only insight? and so on.

original: cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation is for the purpose of destroying and not wasting the grasping at mere sufficiency.

original: bcom ldan 'das lhag mthong la rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das lhag mthong la rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, how many kinds of insight are there? and so on.

original: dbang po yongs su nyams pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po yongs su nyams pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation is for the purpose of destroying and not wasting the degeneration of faculties.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni chos la gnas pa zhes kyang bgyi zhes @160b bya ba la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni chos la gnas pa zhes kyang bgyi zhes @160b bya ba la sogs pa la'o //
translated: The Blessed One, serenity and insight are also called the foundation of dharmas. and so on.

original: dge ba 'phel ba chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: dge ba 'phel ba chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation for the purpose of non-wastage of the increase of virtue is:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni ma 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa zhes kyang bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni ma 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa zhes kyang bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, is it that śamatha and vipaśyanā are said to be the focus on unmixed dharmas? and so forth.

original: rtog pa dang g-yo ba gnyen po dang bcas pa chud mi za bar bya pa'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: rtog pa dang g-yo ba gnyen po dang bcas pa chud mi za bar bya pa'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation for the purpose of non-wastage of investigation, movement, and their antidotes is:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, how is it that śamatha and vipaśyanā become samādhis that are with investigation and with analysis? and so forth.

original: bsgom pa'i rgyu mtshan yongs su shes pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i rgyu mtshan yongs su shes pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation for the purpose of non-wastage of the thorough understanding of the object of meditation is:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan ni gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan ni gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, what is the object of śamatha? and so forth.

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation is for the purpose of not wasting the wisdom of meditative development, in order to destroy manifest pride.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong bsgom pa'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa lags na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong bsgom pa'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa lags na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, if the bodhisattva's cultivation of serenity and insight is the analytical knowledges of dharma and meaning, etc.

original: zhi gnas tsam gyis chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: zhi gnas tsam gyis chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation is for the purpose of not wasting mere serenity.

original: bcom ldan 'das thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis don so sor yang dag par rig pa gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis don so sor yang dag par rig pa gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, what is the analytical knowledge of meaning that arises from the wisdom born of listening, etc.

original: phra ba kun tu 'byung bas yongs su shes pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: phra ba kun tu 'byung bas yongs su shes pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of designation is for the purpose of not wasting the understanding of the subtle arising of the aggregates, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa yid la bgyid pas gang gis mtshan ma gang ji ltar sel bar bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa yid la bgyid pas gang gis mtshan ma gang ji ltar sel bar bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
translated: The Lord: What are the signs, and how are they to be removed by the bodhisattva who is intent on the practice of serenity and insight?

original: / stong pa nyid la skrag pa rnam par bshig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /🔽bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang rtogs na /
analyzed: / stong pa nyid la skrag pa rnam par bshig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni / bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang rtogs na /
translated: In order to remove fear of emptiness and to prevent its loss, the determination of the teaching is as follows:

original: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pas rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i stong ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid bsdus pa gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pas rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i stong ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid bsdus pa gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Lord: What is the summary of the characteristics of emptiness of emptiness, by which the bodhisattvas, having understood the Great Vehicle, do not fall into the abyss through over-estimation of their own level?

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa la ngo bo nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / las dang sbyor ba dang / 'jug pa'i don las brtsams te /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom pa la ngo bo nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / las dang sbyor ba dang / 'jug pa'i don las brtsams te /
translated: The practice of serenity and insight is to be understood in terms of its nature, cause, result, function, endowment, and activity.

original: gdams ngag sbyin pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbang @161a * //
analyzed: gdams ngag sbyin pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbang @161a * //
translated: In order to prevent the loss of the gift of instruction, there is the determination of the designation.

original: pa ni ; bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag gis ting nge 'dzin du zhig bsdus lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa ni ; bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag gis ting nge 'dzin du zhig bsdus lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, By means of serenity and insight, all the concentrations are included.

original: bsgom pa la 'dun pa drag po med pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: bsgom pa la 'dun pa drag po med pa rnam par gzhig cing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: In order to prevent the loss of intense aspiration for meditation, there is the determination of the designation.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la ji ltar bsgrubs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la ji ltar bsgrubs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: The Blessed One said, When the bodhisattva practices serenity and insight, how does he fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment?

original: de la dang por rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dang por rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: First, in order to prevent the loss of the samadhi that abides in nonconceptual consciousness, one should explain the meaning of the words of the definitive treatise.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gcig dang tha dad pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gcig dang tha dad pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The so-called samadhi that abides in nonconceptual consciousness is the samadhi that abides in the consciousness free from the two extremes of sameness and difference in the path of shamatha and vipashyana.

original: de ni mtha' gnyis dang bral bas gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yang yin /
analyzed: de ni mtha' gnyis dang bral bas gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yang yin /
translated: Since that is free from the two extremes, it is nonconceptual because it is indivisible into two.

original: lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas shes pa yang yin la /
analyzed: lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas shes pa yang yin la /
translated: Since it is the essence of the path, it is consciousness.

original: de la gnas na sems kyi ting nge 'dzin grub pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la gnas na sems kyi ting nge 'dzin grub pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
translated: Since the mental samadhi is accomplished by abiding in that, it is called the samadhi that abides in nonconceptual consciousness.

original: chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi ngo bo nyid de las rab tu nyams par mi
analyzed: chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi ngo bo nyid de las rab tu nyams par mi
translated: The Elucidation of the Establishment of the Designation of Non-wastage is the essence of calm and insight distinguished by the concentration of the nondiscriminating cognition.

original: 'gyur zhing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dang bshad pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur zhing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dang bshad pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //
translated: It is taught and explained in order to prevent the degeneration and wastage of that, and is the establishment of the designation of the concentration of the nondiscriminating cognition.

original: de la mtshams sbyar ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshams sbyar ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the connection here?

original: 'dir 'phags pa byams pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du ci zhig zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de tha dad dam gcig pa yin /
analyzed: 'dir 'phags pa byams pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du ci zhig zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de tha dad dam gcig pa yin /
translated: Here, some may think: Is the essence of the path of calm and insight different or the same?

original: gal te tha dad na ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang ji ltar zung du 'brel zhing dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i dmigs pa gcig la dmigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te tha dad na ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang ji ltar zung du 'brel zhing dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i dmigs pa gcig la dmigs par 'gyur /
translated: If they are different, then even at the time of the mental contemplation that is the result of the final stage of preparation, how could they be combined and focus on the same object, the limit of entities and the complete accomplishment of the purpose?🔽If they are the same, then even at the time of the mental contemplation that is the path of the final stage of preparation, how could they focus on different objects, a conceptual image and a nonconceptual image?

original: gal te gcig na ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang ji ltar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa tha dad pa dmigs par 'gyur snyam du sems pa @161b rnams kyi bsam pa la brtags nas /🔽bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi 'am /
analyzed: gal te gcig na ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang ji ltar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa tha dad pa dmigs par 'gyur snyam du sems pa @161b rnams kyi bsam pa la brtags nas / bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi 'am /
translated: Having examined the thoughts of those who think in this way,🔽the Bhagavān was asked, “Are the path of śamatha and the path of vipaśyanā said to be different?

original: tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba zhus bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba zhus bar sbyar ro //
translated: Or are they not different?”

original: byams pa tha dad pa yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes bya'o zhes bya bas ni bstan pas chud mi za ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //
analyzed: byams pa tha dad pa yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes bya'o zhes bya bas ni bstan pas chud mi za ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //
translated: The statement love is neither different nor not different teaches the ascertainment of designation in order to prevent the loss of the teaching.

original: ci'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pas chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //🔽de la lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i sems la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni zhi gnas kyi lam yang lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid la dmigs pas lam gyi ngo bo dmigs pa tha dad pa nyid du gcig pa'i phyir tha dad
analyzed: ci'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pas chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to // de la lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i sems la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni zhi gnas kyi lam yang lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid la dmigs pas lam gyi ngo bo dmigs pa tha dad pa nyid du gcig pa'i phyir tha dad
translated: The statement why is it not different? and so on teaches the ascertainment of designation in order to prevent the loss of explanation.

original: pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Therein, the statement because it observes the mind that is the object of insight teaches that the path of serenity is not different from the path of insight because it observes the essence of the mind that is the object of insight, since the essence of the path is the same as the object.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni lhag mthong gi lam ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs pas zhi gnas dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir gcig pa ma yin no zhes bstan
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni lhag mthong gi lam ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs pas zhi gnas dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir gcig pa ma yin no zhes bstan
translated: This passage teaches that the path of insight is not the same as serenity, since it focuses on a conceptual image and has a different object.🔽In general, the meaning of these terms is summarized in the following verse:

original: to // tshig gi don spyir bsdu na de gnyis lam gyi ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i phyir na tha dad pa ma yin la /
analyzed: to // tshig gi don spyir bsdu na de gnyis lam gyi ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i phyir na tha dad pa ma yin la /
translated: Since the two are the same in being the nature of the path, they are not different.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir ni gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir ni gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: Since their objective conditions are different, they are not the same.

original: gal te lam gyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang zung du 'brel zhing dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i gnas dmigs pa gcig la dmigs par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te lam gyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang zung du 'brel zhing dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'i gnas dmigs pa gcig la dmigs par mi 'gyur la /
translated: If the nature of the path were different, then even in the context of the mental contemplation of the result of practice, serenity and insight would not be united, and they would not focus on the same object, the limit of the existence of things and the accomplishment of one's purpose.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen gcig na ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa tha dad pa la dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen gcig na ni sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i lam gyi yid la byed pa'i gnas skabs na yang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa tha dad pa la dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur
translated: If the objective condition were one, then when one is in the state of mental attention of the path of culmination, there would be the fault that the different images with and without discursive thought would not be observed.

original: bas de'i phyir de gnyis ni tha dad pa yang ma yin gcig pa yang ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: bas de'i phyir de gnyis ni tha dad pa yang ma yin gcig pa yang ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Therefore it is taught that those two are neither different nor the same.

original: de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur zhing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dang bshad
analyzed: de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur zhing chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dang bshad
translated: Thus, in order that the essence of the path of śamatha and vipaśyanā distinguished by the concentration of abiding in nonconceptual consciousness not decline and not be wasted, it is taught and explained.

original: pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin chud @162a * //
analyzed: pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin chud @162a * //
translated: The teaching on the ascertainment of the designation of concentration that abides in nonconceptual consciousness is the ascertainment of the designation of concentration that abides in nonconceptual consciousness.🔽

original: mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa yin no //
analyzed: mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa yin no //
translated: The teaching of the ascertainment of the designation of the concentration of abiding in nonconceptual consciousness is the ascertainment of the designation for the purpose of not losing the concentration of abiding in nonconceptual consciousness.

original: de'i 'og tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, in order to not lose the concept of nonconceptual consciousness, the meaning of the words of the ascertainment of the designation should be explained.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gnyis med pa'i shes pa sems kyi ngo bo nyid dang tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gnyis med pa'i shes pa sems kyi ngo bo nyid dang tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs pa ste /
translated: Nonconceptual consciousness is called a concept because it is the realization that the consciousness of the non-dual image, the object of concentration, is not separate from the nature of the mind.

original: de ni gnyis med pas gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yang lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas shes pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de ni gnyis med pas gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yang lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas shes pa yang yin la /
translated: Since it is non-dual, it is indivisible into two. Therefore, it is nonconceptual. Since it is the nature of the path, it is also consciousness.

original: des sems dang tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa zhes bya'o //🔽chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pas rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur zhing chud
analyzed: des sems dang tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa zhes bya'o // chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pas rab tu phye ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi ngo bo nyid de las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur zhing chud
translated: The realization that it is not different from mind is called the realization of nonconceptual consciousness.

original: mi za bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dang bshad pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: mi za bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dang bshad pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa gdags pa gtan la dbab pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of designation for the purpose of non-wastage is the essence of the path of śamatha and vipaśyanā distinguished by the realization of nonconceptual consciousness. It is taught and explained for the purpose of non-wastage and non-degeneration from that. The ascertainment of designation is the realization of nonconceptual consciousness.

original: de la mtshams sbyar ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshams sbyar ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it connected?

original: 'dir 'phags pa byams pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du rnal 'byor ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de sems de dang tha dad dam gcig pa yin ;
analyzed: 'dir 'phags pa byams pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du rnal 'byor ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de sems de dang tha dad dam gcig pa yin ;
translated: Here, some may think, Is the image that is the object of concentration for the realization of nonconceptual consciousness by yogins different from that mind or the same?

original: gal te tha dad na ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos su gyur pas gnyis med pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa yang ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te tha dad na ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos su gyur pas gnyis med pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa yang ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: If they are different, then since they are phenomena of object and subject, how could the nondual, nonconceptual consciousness realize them?

original: gal te gcig na ni sems dang gzugs brnyan zhes gdags su yang ji ltar rung snyam du sems kyi bsam pa la brtags nas /
analyzed: gal te gcig na ni sems dang gzugs brnyan zhes gdags su yang ji ltar rung snyam du sems kyi bsam pa la brtags nas /
translated: If they are the same, then how could it be tenable to designate them as mind and a reflection?🔽Having examined the thought in this way,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par lta bar bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de ci lags sems de dang tha dad pa zhes bgyi 'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par lta bar bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de ci lags sems de dang tha dad pa zhes bgyi 'am /
translated: the Bhagavān was asked, “Bhagavān, is the object of the meditative concentration of viewing a reflection the same as the mind?

original: tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba zhus par sbyar ro /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba zhus par sbyar ro /
translated: Or is it not the same as the mind?”

original: de la rnam par lta bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par lta bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: Here “viewing” refers to the realization of nonconceptual consciousness by yogins who possess vipaśyanā.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de'o //
translated: That which is the representation of the domain of samādhi means that which is the domain of the samādhi of the mind of śamatha and vipaśyanā, whether it is the conceptual or non-conceptual representation.

original: sems de dang zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong @162b gi sems de dang ngo //🔽byams pa tha dad pa ma yin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan pas chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //
analyzed: sems de dang zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong @162b gi sems de dang ngo // byams pa tha dad pa ma yin zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan pas chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //
translated: The mind means the mind of śamatha and vipaśyanā.🔽It is said that it is not different from love. This teaches the ascertainment of designation in order to prevent waste through teaching.

original: ci'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin zhen zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pas chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //
analyzed: ci'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin zhen zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bshad pas chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir gdags pa gtan la dbab pa bstan to //
translated: Why is it not different? and so on teaches the ascertainment of designation in order to prevent waste through explanation.

original: de la gzugs brnyan de rnam par rig pa tsam du zad pa'i phyir te zhes bya bas ni gzugs brnyan de sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sems de dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la gzugs brnyan de rnam par rig pa tsam du zad pa'i phyir te zhes bya bas ni gzugs brnyan de sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sems de dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: This shows that because that reflection is the nature of mind, it is not different from that mind.

original: de ltar tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs pa nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs pa nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa rtogs pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Thus, the very realization that it is not different is the realization of nonconceptual consciousness.

original: 'o na sems dang gzugs brnyan zhes gdags su yang ji ltar rung snyam pa las rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba yin no zhes ngas bshad do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'o na sems dang gzugs brnyan zhes gdags su yang ji ltar rung snyam pa las rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba yin no zhes ngas bshad do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: If you think, “Well, how can it be suitable to designate it as mind and a reflection?” it is said, “I have explained that consciousness is distinguished by the mere representation of an object.”

original: rnam par shes pa nyid gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa lta bur snang bas sems dang gzugs brnyan zhes gdags su yang rung la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid gzugs brnyan gyi dmigs pa lta bur snang bas sems dang gzugs brnyan zhes gdags su yang rung la /
translated: Consciousness itself appears as if it were the object, a reflection, and so it is suitable to designate it as mind and a reflection.

original: sems kyi ngo bo nyid las tha mi dad pa'i gzugs brnyan de ni rang rig pa'i tshul gyis rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: sems kyi ngo bo nyid las tha mi dad pa'i gzugs brnyan de ni rang rig pa'i tshul gyis rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: The reflection, which is not different from the nature of mind, is cognized by the mode of reflexive awareness. This is the definition of consciousness.

original: de ltar tha dad pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar tha dad pa ma yin na /
translated: If it is not different,

original: dper na mig nyid kyis mig nyid la brtag tu mi rung ba bzhin du sems nyid kyis sems nyid la ji lta bur brtag tu rung snyam pa dag gi phyir /
analyzed: dper na mig nyid kyis mig nyid la brtag tu mi rung ba bzhin du sems nyid kyis sems nyid la ji lta bur brtag tu rung snyam pa dag gi phyir /
translated: then just as the eye itself cannot see the eye itself, how can the mind itself cognize the mind itself?

original: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan de gal te sems de las tha dad pa ma lags na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan de gal te sems de las tha dad pa ma lags na /
translated: With this in mind, the question is asked: “Blessed One, if the reflection that is the object of concentration is not different from the mind,

original: sems de nyid kyis sems de nyid la ji ltar rtog par bgyid lags zhes bya ba zhus so //
analyzed: sems de nyid kyis sems de nyid la ji ltar rtog par bgyid lags zhes bya ba zhus so //
translated: how can the mind itself cognize the mind itself?”

original: de la gzhan dag 'di snyam du rtog par byed pa'i sems ni byed pa por gyur pa yin la brtag par bya ba gzugs brnyan ni las su gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: de la gzhan dag 'di snyam du rtog par byed pa'i sems ni byed pa por gyur pa yin la brtag par bya ba gzugs brnyan ni las su gyur pa yin na /
translated: In this regard, some may think that the mind that conceives is the agent and the reflection that is conceived is the object.

original: ji ltar de gnyis tha dad pa ma yin par rung ste /
analyzed: ji ltar de gnyis tha dad pa ma yin par rung ste /
translated: How could those two be suitable as non-different?

original: 'jig rten ni byed pa po dang las ni tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni byed pa po dang las ni tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro snyam pa la /
translated: Because in the world, the agent and action appear as different.

original: yang dag par na tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang dag par na tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that in reality they are not different,

original: byams pa de la chos gang yang chos gang la yang rtog par mi byed mod kyi zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽chos gang yang zhes bya ba ni byed pa por bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: byams pa de la chos gang yang chos gang la yang rtog par mi byed mod kyi zhes bya ba gsungs te / chos gang yang zhes bya ba ni byed pa por bstan pa yin la /
translated: Maitreya, there is no dharma that conceives of any dharma at all.🔽The phrase “no dharma at all” teaches the agent.

original: chos gang la yang zhes bya ba ni las su bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: chos gang la yang zhes bya ba ni las su bstan pa yin te /
translated: The phrase “any dharma at all” teaches the action.

original: de ltar byed pa po dang las su gyur pa'i tshul gyis rtog par byed pa ni 'ga' yang med par ston to //
analyzed: de ltar byed pa po dang las su gyur pa'i tshul gyis rtog par byed pa ni 'ga' yang med par ston to //
translated: Thus it teaches that there is no conception whatsoever in the manner of being an agent and action.

original: ji lta zhe na chos gcig pu ni 'ga' yang @163a * //
analyzed: ji lta zhe na chos gcig pu ni 'ga' yang @163a * //
translated: How so? No dharma at all is a single thing.

original: med pas rtog par byed pa dang brtag par bya ba byed pa po dang / las su gyur pa 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir dang / yang dag par na sems dang sems las byung ba dang / sa rdul phra rab re re mi snang ba'i phyir byed pa po dang /🔽las kyi tha snyad kyang med la /
analyzed: med pas rtog par byed pa dang brtag par bya ba byed pa po dang / las su gyur pa 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir dang / yang dag par na sems dang sems las byung ba dang / sa rdul phra rab re re mi snang ba'i phyir byed pa po dang / las kyi tha snyad kyang med la /

original: 'dus pa dag la yang kun rdzob yin pa'i phyir ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang mthu med pa'i phyir byed pa po dang las kyi tha snyad med pa'i phyir dang dngos po rang dbang can ni 'ga' yang med pa yin na /🔽'jig rten pa ni byed pa po la mngon par zhen pas bya ba dag 'jug par byed par zad de /
analyzed: 'dus pa dag la yang kun rdzob yin pa'i phyir ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang mthu med pa'i phyir byed pa po dang las kyi tha snyad med pa'i phyir dang dngos po rang dbang can ni 'ga' yang med pa yin na / 'jig rten pa ni byed pa po la mngon par zhen pas bya ba dag 'jug par byed par zad de /
